articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: All 19 Confirmed Characters In ‘Marvel Rivals,’ Its Overwatch-Copying Hero Shooter - Forbes
articles.description: The Marvel Rivals trailer also showed off 19 heroes and villains that the game will supposedly launch with, which mirrors the exact list of leaked ones that was being passed around...
articles.content:
Marvel Rivals
NetEase
What if Overwatch was Marvel heroes and villains? That seems to be the extremely literal concept behind Net Eases new Marvel Rivals, its third-person, very much Overwatch-like… [+3068 chars]
